member.summary: Runs NUnit tests in combination with dotCover test coverage analysis.

remarks.para: The task uses dotCover command line tool to run NUnit command line runner which executes tests for the specified assembly or C# project.
The task uses to download dotCover command line tool into the running user's local application data directory. If the tool is already there, the task skips downloading it.

member.summary: Sets the minimum required test coverage percentage. If any class has the test coverage below this value and is set to true, the task will fail the build.

member.summary: Sets the dotCover filters that will be passed to dotCover's /Filters command line parameter.

member.name: M:FlubuCore.Tasks.Testing.NUnitWithDotCoverTask.DotCoverAttributeFilters(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the dotCover attribute filters that will be passed to dotCover's /AttributeFilters command line parameter. Attribute filters tell dotCover to skip the analysis of any code that has the specified attribute(s) applied.
member.remarks: The default attribute filters are set to "*.ExcludeFromCodeCoverageAttribute". For more information, visit here.
